description: This file defines a Flutter widget 'BoardCell' which represents a single cell in the game board for a snake game. It manages visual rendering based on cell state such as whether it is part of the snake's head, body, or food.

classes.name: BoardCell
classes.description: A stateless Flutter widget that visually represents a board cell, adjusting colors and styles depending on whether it contains the snake's head, body, or food.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the BoardCell, rendering visual style based on the cell's state.
